0.text: Innate - The Ball: Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. The Ball has a 0.15-second global cooldown on all of Orianna's abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, and snaps back to Orianna if she becomes too far away from it.

1.text: Innate - Clockwork Winding: Orianna's basic attacks deal 10 − 50 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit and grant a stack of Clockwork Winding if she attacks the same target again within 4 seconds, stacking up to two times, and refreshing Clockwork Winding's duration on subsequent attacks to the target. Clockwork Windup deals「 20% bonus magic damage 」「 2 − 10 (based on level) (+ 3% AP) bonus magic damage 」 per stack, up to 14 − 70 (based on level) (+ 21% AP) total bonus magic damage.

2.text: Orianna loses all stacks of Clockwork Winding when she attacks a new target.

0.text: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to fly to the target location and remain there, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and to additional enemies in a radius upon landing, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit).
Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to emit an electric pulse around its current location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around it and leaving an electrical field on the area for 3 seconds.

1.text: Orianna and her allies gain  bonus movement speed upon stepping on the field. Enemies, in turn, are  slowed for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.

0.text: Passive: While  The Ball is attached to a unit, it grants them  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

1.text: Active: Orianna commands The Ball to fly to the target allied  champion or herself and attach itself to the target, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through along the way and upon arrival granting the target a  shield for 2.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to unleash a shockwave around itself, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies,  stunning them for 0.75 seconds, and  pulling them 325 − 700 (based on proximity to ball) units towards The Ball.

1.concerningText: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to fly to the target location and remain there, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and to additional enemies in a radius upon landing, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit).

2.concerningText: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to emit an electric pulse around its current location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around it and leaving an electrical field on the area for 3 seconds.
Orianna and her allies gain  bonus movement speed upon stepping on the field. Enemies, in turn, are  slowed for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste

+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 ability power
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
